name: Bizmuth
description: With this piece I tried to combine various scale of pixels to create a feeling of perspective and depth. The small figure add a sense of scale to the piece and will probably end up being around in more gifs. I'm starting to enjoy this process a bit too much, it feels like everything is possible with these animations. I enjoy playing with glitch textures and pixel stretch. I try to apply what I know about traditional painting and color/light theory over random accident of glitches and loops.
